page.title: 18LOCAL HISTORY BUILDINGS
page.content: READ HALL IS VERY FAMOUS LOCALLY.IT WAS THE FAMILY SEAT OF THE NOWELL FAMILY AND IS MENTIONED IN SEVERAL BOOKS INCLUDING."THE PENDLE WITCHES"AND "MIST OVER PENDLE" THE GROUNDS NOW HAVE BEEN SPLIT UP AND SOLD SO THAT THE HOUSE ITSELF ONLY STANDS IN 7 ACRES.IT IS OWNED BY AN ORDINARY FAMILY WHO LIVE THERE AND GO OUT TO WORK.THE GROUNDS CONTAIN QUITE A LOT OF WOODLAND WHICH IS MAINLY FIR TREES.THERE ARE TWO SMALL LAKES WHICH HAVE FISH IN.THE LAKES ARE FED BY A SPRING THE PRESENT OWNER HAS ALSO HAD A SWIMMING POOL BUILT IN THE GROUNDS CLOSE TO THE HOUSE.THERE ARE LOTS OF RABBITS AND SQUIRRELS IN THE GROUNDS AND THE OWNER ALSO BREEDS PEACOCKS.
